duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop strategies and controls necessary to increase shipping efficiencies and decrease shipping costs.
Serve as a liaison between Warehouse Supervisor, employees, and truck lines.
Train and develop employees in shipping, receiving, and warehousing activities.
Ship and receive product using Epicor System; stay current on running/assisting with FFWB and MQM.
Accurately account for all merchandise leaving the facility on a daily basis.
Maintain a clean and orderly warehouse.
Follow all Health & Safety programs; actively participate in Health & Safety training with the purpose of gaining knowledge and understanding.
Contribute to a positive work environment focusing on Lean and continuous improvement initiatives.
